channel.title: Server wont let anyone but me connect. please help!
channel.description:
so I'm just getting started with this private server deal and I'm using someone elses source. I have made a no-ip address and changed the server and port paths in client.java... port checkers are telling me my port is open but I cant login from another computer I have sent the client to.
Anyone able to help?

item.title: Server wont let anyone but me connect. please help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“veraflows, post:4, topic:549565”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=668458.msg4470749#msg4470749 date=1422776277]

4A) IF you’re on the same pc as the server, use localhost.
[/quote]

do you mean my client running on 0.0.0.0 or 127. ?[/quote]
You can literally type the text "localhost"
But 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 should also work… but only for you
Everyone else needs the No-ip or your IP address.

Read full topic
item.source: Server wont let anyone but me connect. please help!

item.title: Server wont let anyone but me connect. please help!
item.dc:creator: @veraflows veraflows
item.description:
@veraflows wrote:

add my skype: saintrawr

I will take you up on that. when will you be available? what time zone are you in?

item.source: Server wont let anyone but me connect. please help!

item.title: Server wont let anyone but me connect. please help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

  1. Portforward
  2. Make sure port 43594 is not blocked in Windows Defender or your Anti Virus.
  3. Make sure your client is set to the ip found here OR that it is your No-IP.
    3A) If you’re using No-IP, make sure the No-IP DUC is always running (Background or not).
  4. Make sure the server is running so players can connect.
    4A) IF you’re on the same pc as the server, use localhost.

Read full topic
item.source: Server wont let anyone but me connect. please help!
